articles.title: Mike Vrabel defends Patriots kicker Andy Borregales after another shaky outing vs. Dolphins
articles.description:
“You’ve got to have a lot of confidence in him, and I do have a lot of confidence. It didn't waver."

articles.title: Seth Moulton says he’s received ‘violent threats’ after asking Trump to condemn political violence
articles.description:
In the wake of Charlie Kirk's death, Moulton called on Trump to condemn political violence. "Let's be serious about where this violence is coming from," he said on CNN.
